      • fix

        public ErrorCode fix(UnitServerHdr hdr)
              throws org.apache.thrift.TException
        mark an extent 'skipped'
        Specified by:
        fix in interface SimpleLogUnitService.Iface
        Parameters:
        hdr - epoch and offset of the extent
        Returns:
        OK if succeeds in marking the extent for 'skip' ERROR_TRIMMED if the extent-range has already been trimmed ERROR_OVERWRITE if the extent is occupied (could be a good thing) ERROR_FULL if the extent spills over the capacity of the stream
        Throws:
        org.apache.thrift.TException
